resources.string: Type here the artist\'s or band\'s name
(based on the last 20 gigs listed in setlist.fm website)
Choose a cool name for your brand new playlist!

Songlist brings the songs played in an artist\'s or band\'s last gigs. Just type in the input below the artist\'s or band\'s name you want to query and choose from the list that will be shown. To create a Spotify playlist, press and hold the artists name in the list below.
Error while querying the data. Please try again
Please choose at least one artist.
Error while loading user. Please try again.
Error while creating the playlist! Please try again.
You\'re offline! Please check your internet connection and try again.
You\'re offline. The query can\'t be done while offline. Please verify your internet connection and try again.
Error while logging in. Please try again.
You\'re offline! Please check your internet connection to be able to update the songs.
